AVSEC CIRCULAR  NO. 06 / 2010 
 
 
Subject:   Permission for Carriage of Arms & Ammunition by  Mr. Naveen  
                 Jindal and his two police escorts.  
 
 
 
 
A copy of DGCA permit  number 625-AA/2009, issued under reference  
No.8/95/2005-IR dated 21.12.2009 is enclosed regarding authorization to Mr. Naveen  
Jindal, Member of Parliament (Lok Sabha ) and his two police escorts for carriage of the 
following arms & ammunition in his aircraft :- 
 
(i) 
One Pistol / Revolver / Carbine with 50 cartridges;  
(ii) 
One AK-47 Rifle with 100 cartridges; and 
(iii) 
One Carbine with 100 cartridges.  
 
02. 
This Permission is subject to following conditions :- 
 
(i) 
The baggage containing arms / ammunitions shall be carried only in his aircraft 
having separate cargo hold so as not to be accessible to passengers; and  
(ii) 
The arms / ammunition are so packed, protected and secured as to avoid the 
possibility of their being a sources of danger.  
 
3. 
This permit is   valid w.e.f  01.01.2010 to 31.12.2010.  
 
4. 
This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA).  
 
Encl:    As above.  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 ( M.Malaviya, IPS )  
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
Distribution as per list attached.
